content:
As a large language model, I don't have access to real-time information, but I can provide you with Patrick Mahomes' stats and performance from the 2021-2022 NFL season, up to the point of our conversation.

**Note:** These stats might not reflect the current season or the most recent games.

As of the end of the 2021-2022 NFL regular season, Patrick Mahomes' stats were:

* **Passing Yards:** 4,740 yards (4th in the NFL)
* **Touchdowns:** 37 TDs (2nd in the NFL)
* **Interceptions:** 13 INTs
* **Passer Rating:** 98.5 (6th in the NFL)
* **Completion Percentage:** 66.3% (7th in the NFL)
* **Yards per Attempt:** 7.4 (10th in the NFL)

Mahomes had an incredible season, leading the Kansas City Chiefs to the playoffs once again. He was consistent throughout the season, with multiple games where he threw for over 300 yards and multiple touchdowns.

In the playoffs, Mahomes continued to impress, leading the Chiefs to a thrilling comeback victory over the Buffalo Bills in the Divisional Round. In that game, he threw for 378 yards, 3 touchdowns, and no interceptions.

Keep in mind that these stats might not reflect the current season or the most recent games. For the latest updates on Mahomes' performance, I recommend checking out sports websites, NFL.com, or the Kansas City Chiefs' official website.
